Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
  system.MapObject
      system.LivingUnit
          system.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, Moveable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ghost
public class Enemy
extends LivingUnit

The Enemy class represents the enemies in the Bomberman Game. It extends class LivingUnit. This class has two methods: one that generates the enemies and one that destroys them.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Brett Leighton, Leotard Niyonkuru, Marc-Andre Cataford, Mete Kemertas, Martin Zhang

Constructor Summary
Enemy(int x, int y)
          creates an enemy at location (x,y) and loads an image at that location
 
Method Summary
 void die()
          destroys the enemy
